_help.verbose: ALL = show all events; ERROR = only errors; WARNING = errors + warnings
_help.search_string: pattern(s) to search in logs. Can be: empty '', single string 'pattern', or array ['pattern1', 'pattern2']
_help.report_dir: directory where timestamped reports will be saved
_help.log_types: ['ALL'] = all logs, or select specific types: ['CL', 'EX', 'TED6']
_help.refresh_logs: true = download fresh logs from EFT server before analysis; false = use existing local logs
_help.log_retention_days: number of days to retain/download logs (default: 2)
